217614.bio: A solid competitor who are often a threat to the top places, but without a league title to their name.

30112.bio: Previous league champions but narrowly missing out last time and will be keen to makes amends.

1297622.bio: Last year's champions are looking to defend their title in the face of some stiff competition this season.

2179010.bio: Often inconsistent but a previous winner and a strong challenger.

193942.bio: Often a challenger, but coming off the back of a poor last season and no title in 6 years, David Armstrong will be looking to turn things around.

2982330.bio: Was part of the leading group last time out, but never quite made the final push. Will be hoping this year they could upset some of the big hitters

8141050.bio: Perennial underachievers but who knows what could happen in a brand new season.

3243465.bio: Two times winners of the league but have missed out on the title in the last 3 seasons so are looking to make a return to the summit of the league.

6996520.bio: Have often run out of steam early in the competition but are hoping to show some more staying power this time around.

1000001.bio: Represent the average team, yet frequently beat everyone else. Ken is an ex-convict with a dark past having just come out of prison.
